issue.title: [CF 1364] Earthen Spike and Crash Lightning conflicting?
issue.body:
Updated today and found that when I press Earthen Spike, it causes the icon for Crash Lightning to disappear, and not reappear until the cooldown on Earthen Spike expires.


> Posted by CurseForge user hochrami | Imported from CurseForge issue #1364 | Raw

comments.body:
Please re-open your ticket with all relevant information, including export strings of the icon that you're using, as well as what version of TMW you're using.

Edited Jan 14, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
